column4: It's best to ask in the channel so anyone else with the same problem can benefit
I'm not a coder, otherwise I'd help
Nvidia drivers are available by default; apt-get install nvidia-glx
Ohh I see. Sorry, my mistake
what are you good at? being loud, doing art?
I can draw with or without a computer, I talk about GNU/Linux a lot, and I can write docs I'm sure
ok then, there's various ways to help. #ubuntu-docs is the ubuntu doc irc channel
and for something arty but non-ubuntu http://openclipart.org/ :)
Okay ... you win by sheer volume lol
no problem, join us in #ubuntu-offtopic some time for non-support discussion :)
